metas.name: Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood
metas.description: Uses catchy songs and relatable scenarios to teach young children important social and emotional skills, similar to Bluey's focus on life lessons.

metas.name: Peg + Cat
metas.description: Introduces basic math concepts in a fun and engaging way with memorable characters and songs, aligning with Curious George's educational approach.

metas.name: Tumble Leaf
metas.description: A stop-motion animated series that encourages exploration, discovery, and problem-solving in a whimsical, nature-filled setting, much like the adventures in Curious George.

metas.name: Puffin Rock
metas.description: Features beautiful animation and gentle storytelling about a puffling named Oona and her brother Baba, exploring their natural environment and learning about friendship and family, similar to the heartwarming family themes in Bluey.

metas.name: The Magic School Bus Rides Again
metas.description: Continues the educational journey of Ms. Frizzle and her class, exploring science concepts through exciting adventures and engaging animation, offering educational value like Curious George.
